name: Take Your Time (KarlShane)
description:
This is my entry to Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.  This game is expected to have some bugs. 

The game is based on a theme "Rewind". 

Take Your Time

You are stuck in a dungeon where monsters takes your age you need to defeat them to take your stolen time and find the exit to this horrible place.

This game is a dungeon crawler with random generated rooms

Note:

 -You need to defeat the enemies inside the room to get out and find the exit to finish the game. 

-Extract the rar file

CONTROLS

KeyActionWASD, Arrow KeysMovementLeft ClickShoot, AttackMouseAiming

Please leave a comment in any issues that you encounter so they can be fixed immediately.
